description:
Help Job the Leprechaun to rescue his friend Eri in this classic platformer game.
Collect all clovers in the stage and find the door to go to the next level.
A horde of goblins, zombies, caterpillars and many more monsters will try to stop you, use your Magic Hat to fight them.
You are not alone in this adventure, yo will meet friends like Catalina Cow and The Elf.

-40 levels full of enemies and puzzles.
-Retro pixel art and chiptune music.
-Casual but challenging gameplay.
name: Job the Leprechaun
